## Location

The conference will be held at the University of Zürich, in building RAA, Rämistrasse 59, 8001 Zürich, Aula RAA-G01, floor G

## How to get there

The venue is easily accessible by public transportation. From "Zürich HB" (main train station), you can take tram line 3/bus 31 to "Neumarkt" , or tram line 6/10 to "ETH/Universitätsspital", which is just a short walk from the building

Alternatively, you can enjoy a scenic 15-20 minute walk from the main station to the venue. For a unique experience, consider taking the Polybahn funicular from "Central" up to "Polyterrasse," followed by a short 5-minute walk to the building.
